Global Forest Watch | DC | Full-Time | https://globalforestwatch.org/

Global Forest Watch is a dynamic platform thatâ€™s changing the future of forest monitoring. We use machine learning and expert analysis to distill satellite imagery, crowdsourced information, and hundreds of open datasets into actionable insights and policy-relevant information about forests worldwide. Our stack uses Elasticsearch to store and query large datasets, Hadoop to pre-calculate tree cover totals within global administrative boundaries, and AWS Lambda to tabulate statistics on raster datasets for user-drawn areas of interest.
